article: One day a rich man was invited to dinner at the home of one of his friends. He did not know what to do with the wine, meat and chicken he had just bought. Certainly he could not _ them to the servant. Then he had _ idea. He called up the servant and _ to him. "I'll be away for the whole evening, and I'll leave you to look after the house. In the cupboard there are two bottles filled with _ . Be careful about it. You'll be killed if you take even a _ of it. There is also some meat and chicken in the cupboard. Take care of them". _ these words the rich man left the home. As soon as the master turned his back, the servant opened the cupboard and began to enjoy all the nice things in it. He _ the two bottles and ate up the meat, the chicken and everything else he found in the cupboard. He was _ and soon fell _ . At mid-night the rich man returned home. He looked into the cupboard and to his great _ , all the wine and food were _ . He was mad with anger and called the servant up. "Oh, Master," the servant began to say _ the rich man could open his mouth; "while you were away, the neighbor's black cat stole into our kitchen and ate up every things in the cupboard. I know you would be angry with me. I was so _ that I drank the two bottles of poison to kill myself "there were tears in the servant's eyes."Oh, Master," he continued, "Please don't get angry with a _ man. I'll soon be dead.
